version_name: 1.3-NOGGIN just keeps on getting better! We've squashed a few bugs and made several performance improvements-Sound issues for users returning to the app have been fixed-Incoming phone calls no longer disrupt your video-playing experience

version_description: We used our NOGGIN and made impressive improvements to our app. Enjoy a better video player, an easier way to subscribe, & a hidden surprise! (HINT: Tap on the sun or moon!)

Say hello to summer with NOGGIN’s new seasonal playlist featuring swimmingly sweet summer-themed videos! While you watch, there will be no need for bug spray--we've squashed a few just so your preschooler can enjoy a smoother NOGGIN experience.
We've polished our registration experience and squashed some bugs just in time for iOS 10!

In this release we've squashed a few bugs and made improvements to your preschooler’s Noggin experience, so they can enjoy our library of eBooks, Play-Along Videos, learning games and more, with little to no interruptions. Thanks for choosing Noggin!
Noggin is on a roll like the Paw Patrol! We’ve cleaned up a few bothersome bugs in the app, so your child’s learning adventures can go uninterrupted!

No job is too big, no bug fix is too small! With this release, we’ve squashed a few bugs to improve your child's Noggin experience. Plus we’re celebrating the season with a new app icon. Thank you for choosing Noggin!

In this release we've updated the app to feature Alphabet Buttons — smart and silly surprises designed to help teach kids letters and words. Noggin also now features Bob Books — the award-winning reading series trusted by parents and educators for over fo
What time is it? It’s time for an update! In this release we’ve squashed a few bugs so your child can have an even better learning experience in Noggin.
In this release we blazed into action to squash a few bothersome bugs. Now your child can experience a better Noggin.

Update to the latest version of Noggin and boost your child's learning with the “Play of the Day” –  a game, book, video or activity selected by our education experts to help grow your child's noggin!
Spring has sprung in the latest version of Noggin! We’ve cleaned up some bothersome bugs, now the app runs smoother and kids can really grow their noggins!
When you download the latest version of Noggin, you can start streaming smart and fun videos from your mobile device to any AirPlay-enabled device on the same network.
We’ve been busy squashing some minor bugs so your little learner’s Noggin experience could be smoother. Thank you for choosing Noggin!

In this release, we fixed a few minor bugs. Thank you for choosing Noggin!

This release includes minor bug fixes that will ensure fewer interruptions during your child’s learning journey!

Thanks for choosing Noggin! This time around we’ve squashed a few bugs, so whether your child is making a masterpiece in our Art Lab, watching a “Word Play” video, or visiting our museum’s hub — they’ll enjoy a much smoother experience.
When you launch the Noggin app, you'll notice our new "Learning Missions" section. Now your child can jump right into learning adventures that advance with them when they're ready!

We've made a few updates so your little learner can complete Learning Missions, watch full episodes, and play smart and fun games without a few bothersome bugs we caught interrupting their experience. Thanks for choosing Noggin!

In this release we've squashed a few bugs so your child can enjoy a smoother experience when they're on learning missions, reading books, discovering our dinosaur digs, or setting sail with new friends from "Santiago of the Seas"!

In this release, we’ve given your child their own space in Noggin! Now when kids tap on their avatar they’ll be able to easily access their favorite games, videos, and books. Thank you for choosing Noggin!
